scripts.generate-docs: for i in src/*.js; do ./node_modules/.bin/jsdoc2md "${i}" > "docs/$(basename ${i%.js}).md"; done
scripts.add-generated-files-to-commit: git add docs/*.md; git add types/*.ts; git add .d.ts
scripts.container-test: docker build . -t  ansi-art/color -f ./containers/test.dockerfile; docker logs --follow "$(docker run -d ansi-art/color)"
scripts.tag-current-version: git tag -a $(echo $(cat package.json | jq '("v" + .version)' --unbuffered) | tr -d "\"") -m "Release Version"
scripts.npm-publish: npm run tag-current-version; git push --follow-tags; npm publish
scripts.generate-artifacts: npm run generate-types; npm run generate-typescript-root; npm run generate-docs
